title: Monday
fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 64F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 18C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.

title: Monday Night
fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.
fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.

title: Tuesday
fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.
fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.

title: Tuesday Night
fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.
fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.

title: Wednesday
fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 73F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.
fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 23C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.

title: Wednesday Night
fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.
fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.

title: Thursday
fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 73F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 23C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

title: Thursday Night
fcttext: Generally fair. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.
fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.

title: Friday
fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 67F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

title: Friday Night
fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

title: Saturday
fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.

title: Saturday Night
fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

title: Sunday
fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

title: Sunday Night
fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

title: Monday
fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 67F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 19C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

title: Monday Night
fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
